text: Willie Lumpkin is a fictional Fantastic Four character from the Marvel Comics universe. He is a mailman. He can wiggle his ears and nose. He is one of the few people to know the secrets of the Fantastic Four. He was played by Stan Lee in Fantastic Four. ==Other websites== * A Conversation between Stan Lee and Roy Thomas, includes dialogue about the Willie Lumpkin comic strip Category:Marvel Comics supporting characters Category:Fantastic Four
title: Willie Lumpkin
